mapper.sql: fav_id, user_code, fav_type, target_code, task_code, opr_time
mapper.select: select a.*, b.key_name as favTypeName, c.code as userName from favorites_info a left join dics_info b on a.fav_type=b.key_value and b.key_code='FTYPE' left join user_info c on a.user_code=c.code where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into favorites_info
fav_id,
user_code,
fav_type,
target_code,
task_code,
opr_time,
code,
#{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update favorites_info
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fav_type = #{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_code = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update favorites_info set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fav_type = #{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_code = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
